explanation: [0-0] In a room, a man with a purple headscarf and headphones looks to the right, holding a white game controller in both hands, tears streaming down his face. There are several round white lights on the ceiling. Behind the man in the purple headscarf, there is a brown sofa with the white English subtitles "POV: Xbox and PS4 players on October 20th."

[0-4] First, the man in the purple headscarf keeps pressing the game controller with both hands, his mouth twitching a few times. The screen switches, the upper part is black, and there are white English subtitles "POV: Xbox and PS4 players on October 20th." The middle part switches to a cartoon city landscape, and a black Spider-Man jumps off a tall building, then swings through the city with both hands grabbing white spider silk. The lower part is also black.

[4-8] Finally, the middle part of the picture moves, the black Spider-Man rolls in the air, and starts to descend rapidly. The black Spider-Man lands on the sidewalk, poses in a squatting position, opens his hands and raises them to both sides of his body. Many cracks appear on the ground around the black Spider-Man. The black Spider-Man stands up and runs to the road. The upper and lower parts remain unchanged, and the picture freezes.
